entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow changing to rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
